column2: Oyo has been the capital of our kingdom since ancient times but the capture of it by the Fulanis changed that.With Oyo Ile again part of our nation the question of moving the capital there once again is reassonable.
§RGain 3 infamy§! With the Fulanis support of the Ilorin traitor it is our mission to protect our northern Border so such can never happen again.
§RGain 3 infamy§! Dahomey has been part of our empire a few decades ago.With our other Lands under our controll again, ist our duty to put the Dahomeys in their place.
§RGain 7 infamy§! With all of our former Lands under our control we shall reinstate the empire.
§RGain 7 infamy§! With all of our Lands under our dominion, we shall claim our borderlands in the name of yoruban glory!
It has been used throughout the country and it isn't insane to think that we ciould use it officially.
§GLose 1 infamy§! We dominate the language and the region.The others are so close to us that they could be seen as integral to our nation.
